name: Messy Marvin
description:
Play as Marvin, the naughtiest of naughty babies to cause absolute chaos to get your babysitter fired before your parents get home.

Controls:

WASD - move

MOUSE 1 - pick up/drop items

E - interact

Pappardelle Team:

Vy Luong  -  3D Artist

Mitch King  -  3D Artist

Raduan Moustafhim  -  Programmer

Kyle Roleson  -  Programmer

Leo Hoerdemann  -  Audio Designer

Ben Barber  -  Designer

This game was made for the March 2023 48-Hour MSU Spartasoft Game Jam.
